comments:
Not positive of conditions that give rise to this, but have seen these for a while in JUnit tests logs from build (not in workspace, though). 


     [java] !ENTRY org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core 4 4 2006-02-28 12:04:34.079
     [java] !MESSAGE Resource /testfiles/jspInJavascript.jsp does not exist.
     [java] !STACK 1
     [java] org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceException: Resource /testfiles/jspInJavascript.jsp does not exist.
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.checkExists(Resource.java:311)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.checkAccessible(Resource.java:187)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.getPersistentProperty(Resource.java:997)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core.internal.java.JSPTranslator.getELTranslatorProperty(JSPTranslator.java:320)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core.internal.java.JSPTranslator.getELTranslatorProperty(JSPTranslator.java:307)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core.internal.java.JSPTranslator.configure(JSPTranslator.java:239)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core.internal.java.JSPTranslator.reset(JSPTranslator.java:376)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.jst.jsp.ui.tests.contentassist.JSPJavaTranslatorTest.testJSPInJavascript(JSPJavaTranslatorTest.java:48)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.jst.jsp.ui.tests.contentassist.JSPJavaTranslatorTest.testAllFiles(JSPJavaTranslatorTest.java:38)
     [java] 	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
Easy enough to fix by cleaning up method and putting in a few gaurds.
This change is a bulk update of all _un_targeted, fixed, resolved bugs upon release of M5. This particular bug _might_ have been fixed earlier than M5. (Feel free to correct).

This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP defects already verified by the reporter but awaiting closure by the assignee.  If you feel this defect was closed inappropriately, please reopen.

Thanks, John Lanuti
